long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hi! Guys. To save you from the information overload on X/Twitter, I developed a post/tweet filtering tool.  It can :
1. block ads
2. filter and retain posts/tweets you might find interesting based on your selection
3. categorise posts/tweets by color (supporting different themes, light, dim, dark)
4. protect your privacy as no personal data or information will be collected
5. enhance both the efficiency and readability of tweets/posts; and finally

Help you SAVE TIME & INCREASE PRODUCTIVITY!
